text:
Hi Folks!

A prospect client of mine is looking for a UI/UX designer for his shopfiy website (not just a developer) to work with me to develop a conversion-focused website.

The primary responsibilities include:

-Designing with a flow in mind

-Matching design principles with conversion principles

-Assisting in conversion-focused research 

-Actually designing and reiterating wire frames 

If you feel like this profile suits you, DM me and I'll send you more details.

The Job is Contract based.

Location: India (Remote) Preferred

text:
Hey all. I've been writing for SaaS and B2B companies for almost 4 years. For the last 3 years I've been focusing on all things content marketing (writing, pr, link-building, outreach, etc.), but this January I finally switched to full-time freelance writing :slightly_smiling_face: Now I work with Scribe, Sendinblue, Whatfix, SuperOffice, and Modash. I usually have 2-4 free spots at the beginning of each month meaning that I can still take 1 or 2 new clients. Here's a (by no means exhaustive) <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zweP1gtouejLqoqWZIaRlXYpmwhYlskYotaS_vFJ52g/edit?usp=sharing|list of my publications> and my <https://www.linkedin.com/in/adelina-karpenkova/|LI account>.

I've recently relocated to Berlin, and if you're from a Berlin-based company, let's go out for a coffee!

Send me a DM if you want to work together!

text:
Hi everyone! I'm so excited to join this channel. My name is Darenton Randall and I have 7+ years of professional Media Marketing experience through content creation, branding, fashion & commercial modeling, advertisements, billboards, tv shows, and movies. In addition, I am skilled with technical and analytical mastery through 6+ years of combined educational and professional engineering. I am currently looking for a Remote (or in Colorado) role for Social Media Management, Content Creation Management, Marketing Management, Product Marketing Management, Advertising, Branding, or a relative position in that I can bring my creative flavor to! If you or anyone you know is hiring for these positions, I would love to have a conversation. 

Send me a DM and feel free to add me on LinkedIn:
<http://Linkedin.com/in/Darenton-randall-630037125|http://Linkedin.com/in/Darenton-randall-630037125>

Looking forward to hearing from you :)

text:
Hello everyone, I am glad to be a part of these amazing community.
I am copywriter, content writer and content creator. I have over 5years of experience working in marketing, writing web copy, marketing copy, blog post, articles, social media management and coperate writing. 
I am looking for a full time remote position in any of these fields. If you have anything interesting and would like to get in touch, send an email to <mailto:badmusdedi@gmail.com|badmusdedi@gmail.com>, send a DM or connect with me on LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/olayinka-gabriella-badmus-9aa1ba1b5|https://www.linkedin.com/in/olayinka-gabriella-badmus-9aa1ba1b5>

I look forward to responses. Thanks:slightly_smiling_face:
